snippet: Dave Robertson, who took over as closer in place of the injured Mariano Rivera, allowed four runs in the ninth after walking a tightrope to a victory on Tuesday night.
abstract: Tampa Bay Rays defeat New York Yankees, 4-1; Yankees closer Dave Robertson gives up four runs in the ninth inning, blowing the save.
lead_paragraph: Dave Robertson, who took over as closer in place of the injured Mariano Rivera, allowed four runs in the ninth after walking a tightrope to a victory on Tuesday night.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Dave Robertson Fails in Second Test as Closer
headline.main: Robertson Fails in Second Test as Closer, Giving Up 4 Runs
headline.print_headline: Robertson Fails in Second Test as Closer, Giving Up 4 Runs
